place_info.title: Tokyo Omakase Sushi & Wagyu (Halal) Asakusa Kimono Experience Restaurant
place_info.address: 3 Chome-27-5 Asakusa, Taito City, Tokyo 111-0032, Japan

reviews.snippet: Best ever Wagyu in entire Tokyo! Omg I can’t believe, it tastes like heaven!!! So yummy! We tried Wague Sushi! This is definitely one of the Tokyo’s gem. We found this restaurant on our last day staying in Kyoto and wish we had found this place earlier so we could have come more and more! They also had the best customer service! The Japanese music and the vibe was so calming and traditional! Overall best food experience in Tokyo! Highly recommend!

extracted_snippet.original: Best ever Wagyu in entire Tokyo! Omg I can’t believe, it tastes like heaven!!! So yummy! We tried Wague Sushi! This is definitely one of the Tokyo’s gem. We found this restaurant on our last day staying in Kyoto and wish we had found this place earlier so we could have come more and more! They also had the best customer service! The Japanese music and the vibe was so calming and traditional! Overall best food experience in Tokyo! Highly recommend!

response.snippet:
Dear Niloofar Yasini,
Thank you very much for visiting Tokyo Omakase Sushi & Wagyu (Halal) Asakusa Kimono Experience Restaurant. It was truly wonderful to see your smile!
In addition to Edomae sushi, a style that has been passed down since the Edo period, we also offer sushi made with Wagyu beef, which is a must-try when visiting Japan. Since our restaurant originally served omakase course meals, we also offer a wider variety of sushi, Japan's famous tofu, and traditional desserts. We also offer Wagyu burgers and ramen, so there is something for everyone. We hope you have a wonderful stay in Japan.

reviews.snippet:
You get what you pay for.
Wagyu melts in your mouth with no chewing.
With the experience.

reviews.snippet:
The staff was really kind and informative about the sushi.
We we’re so lucky to get a taste of the sushi do free,
I got the wagyu sushi and the staff came and torched it, in front of us which was mega cool, and the taste of the wagyu sushi was amazing, the meat just melts in the mouth
